description.raw:
Getting and setting of globals, and virtual-clicking of engage button with:

`runmanager.remote.get_globals()`

`runmanager.remote.set_globals()`

`runmanager.remote.engage()`

Requires a runmanager host and port to be set in labconfig, otherwise defaults
used. One may also intantiate a `runmanager.remote.Client` manually to specify
any host and port. The server uses the labconfig port, or a default if not
present.

Require labscript_utils 2.12.5 ([labscript_utils pull request 80](#!/labscript_suite/labscript_utils/pull-requests/80/)) with a fix for the security-wrapped ZMQClient class.

This is a work in progress, but we're about to start using it in this form fairly imminently so I've gotten the most important functions in place first.

This partially addresses issue #68
description.html:
Getting and setting of globals, and virtual-clicking of engage button with:

runmanager.remote.get_globals()

runmanager.remote.set_globals()

runmanager.remote.engage()

Requires a runmanager host and port to be set in labconfig, otherwise defaults used. One may also intantiate a runmanager.remote.Client manually to specify any host and port. The server uses the labconfig port, or a default if not present.

Require labscript_utils 2.12.5 (labscript_utils pull request 80) with a fix for the security-wrapped ZMQClient class.

This is a work in progress, but we're about to start using it in this form fairly imminently so I've gotten the most important functions in place first.

This partially addresses issue #68
